subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm Pt
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm
Pt

PARIS HILTON TO JAIL!
The
countdown is on -- Paris hilton is going to jail! As a
Judge sentences Paris to serve 45 days for violating
probation,
Showbiz Tonight asks the burning questions:Did
she get what she
deserved?Was the sentence too harsh? And
get this: we reveal
why this could make Paris more popular
than ever!Plus, Showbiz
Tonight takes you inside the jail
where Paris will be locked
up. We even know what she'll be
wearing and eating! Complete
coverage on TV's most
provocative entertainment news show!

IMITATING ANNA
NICOLE SMITH!
 As "Law and Order:Criminal Intent" takes
on the Anna Nicole
Smith saga,we've got the actress
playing the lead role!
Tonight, Kristy Swanson reveals what
it was like to play the
larger-than-life Anna Nicole! Don't
miss the the compelling
interview you'll see only on
Showbiz Tonight!

EXCLUSIVE! STARS IN REHAB!
Showbiz Tonight's Brooke Anderson is the only reporter
allowed
inside the "rehab-to-the-stars" facility where some
of
Hollywood's biggest stars go to get their act together.
Tonight
Brooke sits down with famed fashion designer Marc
Jacobs inside
the facility, where he is spending 30 days to
beat his
addictions. It's the exclusive interview you will
see only on
Showbiz Tonight!

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT
QUESTION OF THE DAY
Paris Hilton going to jail: Did she
get what she deserved? 
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ
TONIGHT!

SEND US A VIDEO EMAIL
Send
your response to the Question Of The Day on video. Look
into your camera and tell us what you think. Responses must
be
no longer than 30 seconds. To send your video email, go
to
cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your video responses on
"Showbiz
Tonight" at 
11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN Headline
Prime.
